Sharif University CTF 2016 - Writeups

Feb 7, 2016

For our first CTF, we finished 124th with 800 points (1437 teams in total and 448 teams who flagged at least one challenge).

There were some really interesting and challenging tasks. We only managed to complete a few though. You can find the writeups for the challenges we completed below.
